snippet: The NATO secretary general, Anders Fogh Rasmussen, said Russia and the West must send a unified message that the Syrian government must halt violence.
lead_paragraph: The NATO secretary general, Anders Fogh Rasmussen, said Russia and the West must send a unified message that the Syrian government must halt violence.

headline.seo: NATO Chief Sees Parallels Between Syria and Balkans
headline.main: NATO Chief Sees Parallels Between Syria and Balkans
headline.print_headline: NATO Chief Sees Parallels Between Syria and Balkans
